signature_classic.name: ROSY PEAR
signature_classic.description:
Pear, pink guava, lemon, fermented milk, basil

Tropical forward mocktail, textured with fresh pear. The crowd’s favorite.

signature_classic.name: MATCHA FIZZ
signature_classic.description:
Matcha foam, cucumber, lemon, ginger ale

Light, vibrant, and fizzy with a hint of matcha notes and a cucumber punch. Matcha, in a fresh and intriguing take.

signature_classic.name: PURPLE BE LIKE
signature_classic.description:
Butterfly pea, maraschino cherry, lime, mint

A refreshing and delicate beverage with a prominent botanical flavor.

signature_classic.name: TEPACHE SOUR
signature_classic.description:
Fermented pineapple, cane sugar, lime-lemon, aquafaba, tarragon

Our funky mocktail, sweet and tart, with pineapple predominant.

wellness_blend.name: SMOOTH NOT CRIMINAL
wellness_blend.description:
Ginger, turmeric, chia seeds, honey citron, lemon oleo

Our immune boosting beverage, high in antioxidants and is deliciously refreshing.

wellness_blend.name: IS THIS THRILLER
wellness_blend.description:
Beet root, apple, lemongrass-fennel, lemon, dehydrated apple

Exhibiting fruity, earthy, and energizing elements.

wellness_blend.name: RED OR WHITE
wellness_blend.description:
Aloe vera, chamomile, watermelon foam, dehydrated lemon

An aromatic and revitalizing blend of two mellow palates, enhanced with an aroma of watermelon foam.

wellness_blend.name: HEAL THE HEART
wellness_blend.description:
Tarragon, calamansi, honey, smoke paprika, dehydrated calamansi

An exceptional herb (tarragon) with numerous benefits, balanced with a pleasant acidity and a paprika smoke undertone.

limited_craft.name: CHAT BLANC
limited_craft.description:
Carbonated yogurt, mint, lime, anisette

Fragrant and minty with a hint of creaminess. My cat-inspired mocktail, MOJI.

limited_craft.name: TRAVELING PLUM
limited_craft.description:
Kiamoy, assam black tea, orange

Dried plum is a savory and sweet Filipino snack that pairs exceptionally well with tannin and citrus.

limited_craft.name: SIMBANG GABI
limited_craft.description:
Coconut, ube foam, parmesan cheese, burnt nyog

Our take on our traditional delicacy purple rice cake (Puto bumbong), with just the right amount of sweetness, umami, and burnt flavors.

limited_craft.name: ANG PAO
limited_craft.description:
Peach, hibiscus, cinnamon, apricot coin

A blend of cranberry and herbal notes with velvety peach nuances.

limited_craft.name: THE MISTLETOE
limited_craft.description:
Kiwi, citrus, strawberry caviar

This lovely drink is highly refreshing and vivid, with strong fruity and tart flavor.

tea_craft.name: ENDLESS SUMMER
tea_craft.description:
Jasmine tea, lychee, lemon, pandan

Combination of green tea, lychee, and pandan creates a harmonious taste profile. Supple and silky.

tea_craft.name: MATCHA SESAME
tea_craft.description:
Matcha, roasted sesame seeds, cream

Mellow vegetal aromas with a hint of nuttiness, slightly sweet and bitter with an elegant savory finish.

tea_craft.name: EXTRA DIRTY
tea_craft.description:
Chai cordial, premium matcha, milk blend

A pleasing marriage of grassy green tea and spiced black tea in a rich and creamy style beverage.

tea_craft.name: AMARONE ICED TEA
tea_craft.description:
Thai tea, dried grapes, lemon

The robust Thai tea pairs excellently with the essence of dried fruits, creating a mocktail reminiscent of rich and complex flavors found in Amarone wine.

tea_craft.name: THE BANGKOK
tea_craft.description:
Thai tea, milk blend, cream, nutmeg

Delicious and traditional Thai tea, sweet and hearty with a unique black tea notes.

tea_craft.name: BANANA MASALA
tea_craft.description:
Chai tea, muscovado-banana, milk blend, banana brulėe

The most aromatic tea, with a lot of herbs and spices, and a touch of caramelized banana to make it more complex.

coffee_craft.name: SAGADA MOJITO
coffee_craft.description:
Cold brew, mint, ginger ale, lime

Our variation on the classic mojito, boosted with caffeine for a more stimulating experience.

coffee_craft.name: YEMA AFFOGATO
coffee_craft.description:
Yema, cold brew, milk blend, cream

A harmonious fusion of a cherished Filipino confection and an intense local coffee. Extremely addictive!

coffee_craft.name: MOCHA ROMANO
coffee_craft.description:
80% Dark cocoa, cold brew, lemon oleo saccharum, cream, lemon zest

Blending three aromatic bitter ingredients with cream for a beautiful finish results for a velvety and captivating beverage.

coffee_craft.name: WHITE CHRISTMAS
coffee_craft.description:
Biscoff, cold brew, fresh milk, white chocolate cream

Indulge in a delectable combination of buttery spiced cookies and coffee, elevated with a luscious white chocolate cream.
